skill.name: QiGong
skill.description: You sacrifice your mana pool and mana regeneration in order to obtain a different kind of internal energy. Fish are also somehow involved.

skill.name: Poisoneer
skill.description: You can infect your enemies with virulent poisons in a variety of manners.

skill.name: Bushido
skill.description: You have heard tales of the warriors of the East plunging headlong into the jaws of death without fear or hesitation. This is your best attempt at doing something vaguely akin to that.

description.text: You've trained in the art of converting your external mana into powerful internal energies. Fish are somehow involved.
You can infect your enemies with virulent poisons in a variety of manners.
You have heard tales of the warriors of the East plunging headlong into the jaws of death without fear or hesitation. This is your best attempt at doing something vaguely akin to that.
You can channel the raw, carnal energy of the cosmos through your feet, weapons, and occasionally frozen fish.
You unleash your raw, carnal energies at your foes and occassionally live fish.
By pushing vast quantities of raw, carnal energies through your body, you can shrug off vile magic and toxins, and occasionally raw, carnal fish.
You sacrifice any hope of naturally regaining Mana for a huge boost of raw, carnal energy. And occasionally GHOTI. Also, more Qi Blasting!
You may call upon the raw, carnal fishness of every particle of matter in your vicinity to wreak massive havoc upon your foes...if it doesn't kill you.
You have a chance to poison your enemies with something mysterious that never manages to show up in your inventory or be used for any other purpose.

You've found a way to turn common everyday dungeon mold into a potent neurotoxin. It only lasts for a while before it wears off your blade, and it's only occasionally effective, but when it is effective, it's nasty!
Any old thing you happen to toss at someone gets a good firm dipping in your secret sauce first.
You found a special way to cause your usual poison to work BACKWARDS, putting a body back together. Awesome!
You have a chance to very direly poison your enemies with something mysterious that never manages to show up in your inventory or be used for any other purpose.
You've been dealing with poison so long that your very blood is prone to poisoning the people near you whenever you get hit hard enough to cause a spray.
Samurai didn't believe in stealth so much as in yelling really loud, pretty much all the time.
Your body is immutable like the mountain. Sometimes, when hit, you'll show it.
You have achieved martial oneness with the universe. The universe tells you when to get the hell out of Dodge.
Your body is immutable like the mountain...unless your mind gets in the way. Now, you can fix that for a while!
You have learned to change your inner self, and in so doing, made enemy magic harder to figure you out.

ability.name: Headlong Into the Jaws of Death

description.text: You no longer fear anything. Your spirit adapts to enemy attacks up to, but not including, Death itself.
Everyone has to die at some place and time. Why not here and now? Gives you incredible powers so long as you make a stand. Move, and you laugh alone.
